name: Medieval simulators: Baker
description:
A relaxing simulator for lovers of the Middle Ages and nature. You play the role of a medieval baker who has to earn coins, improve his own farm, harvest wheat, grind grain, chop wood and bake. Learn a lot of recipes, improving your character's skills. You will need to monitor the performance of your hero and restore them in time.

The economy of the game will force you to interact with several merchants and take short cuts.

Additional medieval board games await you in the small tavern.





  • Small cozy open world
  • 100+ recipes
  • Building constructions
  • 3 mini-games in the tavern
  • Unique graphics
  • Atmosphere of nature
  • Author's soundtracks from the developer

Welcome to the game "Medieval simulators: Baker" and enjoy the game. :)



* No assets *
